tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_data (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    threat_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    analysis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE security_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_type VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cyber_attacks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attack_name VARCHAR(255),
    severity VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE prevention_methods (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    method_name VARCHAR(255),
    details TEXT
)
